page.title: 01Gamston
page.content: Welcome to the{Gamston}area! This is an area where mainly grass and cereal crops are grown. There is the small village of{Gamston,}the hamlet of{Bassingfield}and a few isolated farms. The{A52}road from{Nottingham}to {Grantham}runs across from west to east. At the southern edge is{Nottingham {Airport.}It is not an international airport but it has light aircraft and there is a flying club. In the north of the area is part of {Holme Pierrepont Watersports Centre where sailing and water-skiing regattas are held. Near to it is {Adbolton Hall}where elderly people are cared for. In{Bassingfield}there is a riding stables where people can go to ride horses and have riding lessons.
